result.purpose: Responsible for managing waypoint profiles and points, including client interactions and data models.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating client interfaces and data models related to waypoint functionalities.

internal/infras/waypoint/client.go.purpose: Defines a client interface and its implementation for interacting with waypoint profiles and points management.

internal/infras/waypoint/models.go.purpose: Defines data models for waypoint-related functionalities including error handling, wallet management, and point system.
